parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of broken-out sections in this view

title: IView.IGetBreakOutSections
description: Gets all of the broken-out sections in this view.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of broken-out sections in this view

returns: In-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of broken-out section features VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetBreakOutSectionCount
to get the value for Count.
